About

With the abundance of content and channels available to users in today's digital space, businesses often find themselves competing for every second of their customers attention. SearchBoost.ai ensures the user experience is both frictionless and applicable to their needs by providing predictive, relevant and personalized search results.

  Privacy Center  

This privacy policy describes the privacy practices of SearchBoost.ai’s websites. If you are a resident of North America, your relationship is with SearchBoost.ai Solutions Incorporated (SearchBoost.ai U.S.) and the laws of California and the United States apply. While using our website, you authorize SearchBoost.ai to transfer your personal information across national borders and to other countries where SearchBoost.ai and its partners operate, including the United States. The privacy protections and rights of authorities to access your information in these countries may not be equivalent to those in your country. We will only transfer your personal information to these countries where permitted to do so by law and we will take steps intended to ensure that your personal information continues to receive appropriate protections.

If the content or information that you store on SearchBoost.ai websites contains personal information of other individuals, you must be legally permitted to share the personal information with SearchBoost.ai.

Key Points

Wherever required, SearchBoost.ai will request your permission before undertaking any of the following:

Accessing information stored on your device relating to your use of, and engagement with websites and crash reports

  1. Sending you promotional content or any form of news About SearchBoost.ai
  2. Analyzing your content by means of automated systems. You can withdraw your consent to such activities at any time
  3. This policy explains when we process personal information for our legitimate interests. You can ask us to stop processing this information.

This policy explains when we process personal information for our legitimate interests. You can ask us to stop processing this information.

  • SearchBoost.ai uses your personal information to help you to register with us, to grant you access to our websites, and to provide you the products or services that you request.
  • To track visitors’ usage of SearchBoost.ai’s websites, SearchBoost.ai uses cookies and other technologies. If you are using our website in a browser, this information is also available in our Cookies Policy.
  • SearchBoost.ai’s web properties are equipped with interactive features to help you engage via social media. If you use these features, these sites will send us personal information about you.
  • Your content will be publicly available when you post comments, upload pictures, or submit content in several places within SearchBoost.ai’s websites. SearchBoost.ai may also disclose personal information to certain companies in the SearchBoost.ai partner network and with advertising and sales partners consistent with your choices. We may also share information with third parties we engage to process information on our behalf, or in certain other situations.
  • SearchBoost.ai may transfer your personal information to certain countries including the US and other nations, which may be outside the country in which you live.
